content: I can say that the trend towards inclusivity and diversity in the beauty industry seems to be growing, and i hope that it will indeed become the norm. the beauty industry has a powerful impact on our culture's perception of beauty, and it's important for the industry to promote a more diverse and inclusive standard of beauty. consumers are becoming increasingly vocal in their demand for more inclusive products and marketing, and brands are starting to recognize the importance of listening to their customers. therefore, it's likely that more beauty brands will continue to take steps towards inclusivity as a way to better serve their customer base and promote a more positive message of beauty.
